title: British and Irish Acts Headline Reading and Leeds Festival 2026
summary: The Reading and Leeds Festival 2026 will be headlined by British stars Charli XCX, Dave, and Raye, along with Irish rockers Fontaines DC, electronic duo Chase & Status, and singer Florence + The Machine. Organizers highlight that this marks the first time in 25 years that all headliners are exclusively from Britain and Ireland, emphasizing a focus on local talent. The festival, scheduled for August 27-30, will feature additional performances by artists like Kasabian, Kneecap, Skepta, and international acts such as Sombr and Role Model. A notable change includes a Thursday headline slot at Leeds with Kasabian. Tickets go on general sale on Thursday, with presales already available. This lineup contrasts with previous years that included more international headliners like Travis Scott and Chappell Roan, reflecting a strategic shift to promote homegrown artists in the music industry.
